name: Survival Island R - Radiation World
description:
Survive in lost nuclear wasteland like Chernobyl or Pripiat! Be a stalker!

Welcome to lost radiation island! Beware of mutants and radiation! Island has many dangerous
Get resources, find weapons. Survive at this island.
Be ready for scary post apocalypse zombies, mutants. Discover all secrets of this radiation zone.
This is chance to survive like stalker.

Survival Island R:
- big island and many secrets
- real island survival mode
- radiation atmosphere
- different resources and mutants

Try to survive! Be a real stalker! Play Survival Island R!
